Call Street Tallahassee, FL 32306, angelina.sutin@med.fsu.edu Conflicting Interests: None 29 9 2025 498036 13591053251369384 13591053251369384 28 08 2025 01 10 2025 02 10 2025 02 10 2025 Purpose in life is associated with less pain intensity when measured between-person. The present research used a micro-longitudinal study to examine the dynamic, within-person association between purpose and pain in daily life.
